DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To observe response rate ameloblastoma dabrafenib 6 week . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I. Feasibility safety patient population . II . Response assess pathologically . III . Two main histologic assay treatment response use : tumor necrosis phosphorylated-mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 1 ( MEK ) , phosphorylated-extracellular signal-regulated kinase ( ERK ) , Ki-67 level measure immunohistochemistry . OUTLINE : Patients receive dabrafenib orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) every 12 hour 6 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients whose disease judge amenable resection continue dabrafenib indefinitely long tumor progression . After completion study treatment , patient follow least 4 week .
